00031         const double *mDKr_Ds;                                  // derivatives to saturation (nPhases*(nPhases-1))
00032

00034

00036

00038         double *mMobility, *mDMobility_Dp;              // phase mobility and derivative to pressure (nPhases) 
00039         double *mDMobility_Ds;                                  // derivative to saturation (nPhases*(nPhases-1))
00040         double *mDMobility_DT;                                  // derivative to temperature (nPhases)
00041 
00042         // --- directional relative permeability requires directional mobility ---
00043     int nDir;
